presentation.title: AIkinsey — Autonomous AI Workforce for SMEs
presentation.subtitle: Seed/Series A Investor Pitch Deck

content.title: AIkinsey
content.subtitle: An Autonomous Workforce of AI Employees for Organizational Management, Consulting & Operations

content.title: SME Operational Inefficiency
content.subtitle: Small Companies Face Enterprise Challenges Without Enterprise Resources
items: [TrendingDown] Analytical Capacity Gap — Limited access to advanced analytics; intuition-driven decisions
[Database] Information Silos — Data scattered across ERP/CRM/Slack without unified visibility
[Users] Limited Human Expertise — SMEs (5–100 employees) can't afford specialists in HR, Finance, Data, Legal
[DollarSign] Reliance on External Consultants — Expensive ($150–500/hr), slow, static reports
[AlertCircle] Data Utilization Deficit — Organizations collect data but rarely learn or act in real time

content.title: $47B+ Addressable Market in AI-Powered SME Productivity
Autonomous AI Workforce
content.subtitle: Not a Tool. A Workforce.
items: [User] Personal AI Coworker for Every Human — Dedicated AI assistant trained on role, tools, workflows
[Users] Departmental AI Employees — Virtual specialists in Finance, HR, Data, Legal, Operations
[Network] AI-to-AI Collaboration — AI employees communicate across tools to create unified organizational memory
[Brain] Chief AI Officer — Coordinates all AI employees; performs system-wide optimization and planning
[Clock] Always-On Consultancy — 24/7 monitoring, learning, and improvement

content.title: Phased Deployment: POC to Full Org Synergy

cards.title: Phase 1: POC (Week 1)
cards.description: Organizational diagnosis; map workflows, identify bottlenecks, baseline metrics

cards.title: Phase 2: MVP (Weeks 2–4)
cards.description: Deploy AI to one dept; 20–35% productivity improvement Week 1

cards.title: Phase 3: Expansion (Mo 2–6)
cards.description: Roll out to Finance → HR → Sales → Ops; AI-to-AI collaboration

cards.title: Phase 4: Synergy (Mo 6+)
cards.description: Reinforcement learning; continuous optimization; compounding advantage

lists.title: AI Employees
items: [DollarSign] Alex (Finance AI) — Cash flow forecasting, invoice reconciliation
[Users] Jordan (HR AI) — Onboarding automation, compliance tracking
[BarChart3] Sam (Data AI) — Analytics dashboards, predictive modeling
[Settings] Morgan (Ops AI) — Process optimization, task automation

lists.title: AI-to-AI Collaboration
items: Finance AI detects budget overrun
Operations AI analyzes timelines
HR AI suggests resource reallocation
Chief AI Officer presents recommendation to CEO

content.title: AIkinsey = AI Assistants + AI Agents + Consulting, Unified
items: [MessageSquare] AI Assistants (ChatGPT, Copilot) — Single-task tools; no memory | AIkinsey: Multi-agent system with org memory
[Bot] AI Agent Teams (AutoGPT, LangChain) — Technical complexity | AIkinsey: Pre-trained for SMEs; turnkey
[Briefcase] Consulting Firms (McKinsey, Deloitte) — Expensive, static reports | AIkinsey: Always-on 24/7 at 10% cost
[Building2] Enterprise AI (Salesforce Einstein) — Built for large enterprises | AIkinsey: Designed for SMEs; operational Week 1

highlight.text: Unique Moat: Continuous consulting + operations + analytics with reinforcement learning

content.title: Value-First Billing: We Only Get Paid After Proven ROI
items: [CreditCard] Subscription Pricing — $150–300/employee/month or $2,500–5,000/dept/month
[CheckCircle2] Value-Based Billing — Payment after analysis approval and measurable ROI
[TrendingUp] Upsell & Expansion — Additional departments, integration add-ons, white-label partnerships
[DollarSign] Unit Economics — ACV: $36K | CAC: $8.5K | Payback: 3–4 mo | LTV:CAC 5.2:1
[PieChart] Gross Margin — 78% (cloud infrastructure ~22%)

content.title: Land & Expand via Direct Sales + Integration Partnerships

lists.title: Phase 1: Israel & US East Coast
items: [Target] Direct sales to 50–200 employee SMEs
[Users] Target: CEOs/COOs (efficiency), CFOs (analytics)
[Megaphone] LinkedIn outbound + content marketing
[Calendar] Industry conferences: SaaStr, SaaStock

lists.title: Phase 2–3: Partnerships + PLG
items: [Puzzle] ERP/CRM integrations: Monday, Salesforce, NetSuite
[Handshake] White-label consulting firm partnerships
[Gift] Free trial for 1 department (14 days)
[Rocket] Self-serve onboarding for <20 employee companies

content.title: $12M ARR by Year 3 with Strong Unit Economics
content.subtitle: 3-Year Forecast (Assumptions)
items: [Calendar] Year 1 (2025): 25 customers | $900K ARR | 68% gross margin
[TrendingUp] Year 2 (2026): 120 customers | $4.3M ARR | 75% gross margin | CAC improves
[Rocket] Year 3 (2027): 340 customers | $12.2M ARR | 78% gross margin | Break-even targeted
[Target] Burn Rate: $120K/mo Y1 → $210K/mo Y2 → $380K/mo Y3
[Banknote] Runway: 18 months post-raise → Series A readiness

content.title: Trust-by-Design: Security, Privacy, and Governance Built-In

cards.title: Governance Agent
cards.description: GDPR/ISO controls, audit trails, data minimization, real-time compliance monitoring

cards.title: Gradual Adoption
cards.description: AI starts in 'suggest' mode → 'automate' after approval; onboarding & coaching flows

cards.title: Enterprise Security
cards.description: SOC 2 Type II, end-to-end encryption, RBAC, on-premise deployment option

cards.title: Explainability
cards.description: All AI recommendations include reasoning and data sources; human-in-the-loop for high-stakes decisions

content.title: Compounding Advantage Through Continuous Learning
items: [RefreshCw] Reinforcement Learning Flywheel — AI learns from every interaction → improves recommendations → better outcomes → attracts more customers
[Database] Organizational Memory as Moat — Deep integration creates switching costs; AI becomes embedded in workflows
[Target] Vertical-Specific AI Employees — Pre-trained for industry niches (Legal AI for law firms, Clinical Ops for healthcare)
[Network] Data Network Effect — Aggregated anonymized data enables better forecasting and benchmarking; competitors lack training data

highlight.text: First-mover advantage in SME-specific AI workforce category

lists.title: Founders [Placeholder]
items: [User] CEO — AI/ML expert, previous exits, MIT Computer Science
[Code] CTO — Ex-OpenAI Engineer, Stanford PhD (Reinforcement Learning), 10+ years ML
[Briefcase] COO — Ex-McKinsey Consultant, Harvard MBA, led digital transformation for 50+ SMEs

lists.title: Advisors & Key Hires [Placeholder]
items: [Scale] Legal/Compliance Advisor — GDPR and AI governance expert
[Network] Enterprise Architect — Integrations and API strategy
[Target] Head of Sales (to be hired) — SME SaaS sales leader, 10+ years experience

content.title: The Future of Work is Hybrid: Humans + AI Employees, Together
content.subtitle: 2025–2030 Roadmap
items: [Target] 2025–2027: Build the Autonomous SME Workforce — 500+ SMEs running hybrid operations
[TrendingUp] 2028+: Expand to Mid-Market — 200–1,000 employee companies; vertical solutions (healthcare, legal, mfg)
[Globe] Long-Term Vision: Not a tool. A workforce. — Every org has access to enterprise-grade intelligence
[Users] Impact: AI handles complexity; humans focus on strategy, creativity, relationships
[Sparkles] 10M+ human employees augmented by AIkinsey by 2030

highlight.text: SMEs compete on equal footing with Fortune 500 companies

content.title: The Ask: $3M Seed Round
content.subtitle: 18-Month Runway to Scale Pilot → Product-Market Fit → Growth
footer: Use of Funds: 50% Product Dev | 30% Sales & Marketing | 15% Infrastructure | 5% Legal/Compliance
Milestones: 50 customers @ Month 6 | 100 customers @ Month 12 | 150 customers @ Month 18 | Series A ready
What We're Offering: Ground floor in AI workforce category • 20–35% Week 1 productivity gains • 5.2:1 LTV:CAC • Clear path to $50M+ ARR
